mapper.select: select s.id,s.service_msg,s.time,s.status,u.name,r.room_no from service as s inner join room as r inner join room_type as t inner join user as u where s.room_id=r.id and r.room_type_id=t.id and u.id=s.user_id and t.hotel_id=#{2} order by s.id limit #{0},#{1}
select count(*) from service as s inner join room as r inner join room_type as t where s.room_id=r.id and r.room_type_id=t.id and t.hotel_id=#{0}
mapper.update: update service set status=#{1} where id=#{0}
